panels.description: Busy state of all CPU cores together
panels.title: CPU Busy

panels.description: Busy state of all CPU cores together (5 min average)
panels.title: Sys Load (5m avg)

panels.description: Busy state of all CPU cores together (15 min average)
panels.title: Sys Load (15m avg)

targets.expr: sum by(instance) (irate(node_cpu_seconds_total{ mode="system",instance=~"$instance.*"}[$__rate_interval])) / on(instance) group_left sum by (instance)((irate(node_cpu_seconds_total{instance=~"$instance.*"}[$__rate_interval])))

sum by(instance) (irate(node_cpu_seconds_total{mode="user",instance=~"$instance.*"}[$__rate_interval])) / on(instance) group_left sum by (instance)((irate(node_cpu_seconds_total{instance=~"$instance.*"}[$__rate_interval])))

sum by(instance) (irate(node_cpu_seconds_total{ mode="iowait",instance=~"$instance.*"}[$__rate_interval])) / on(instance) group_left sum by (instance)((irate(node_cpu_seconds_total{instance=~"$instance.*"}[$__rate_interval])))

sum by(instance) (irate(node_cpu_seconds_total{ mode=~".*irq",instance=~"$instance.*"}[$__rate_interval])) / on(instance) group_left sum by (instance)((irate(node_cpu_seconds_total{instance=~"$instance.*"}[$__rate_interval])))

sum by(instance) (irate(node_cpu_seconds_total{mode!='idle',mode!='user',mode!='system',mode!='iowait',mode!='irq',mode!='softirq',instance=~"$instance.*"}[$__rate_interval])) / on(instance) group_left sum by (instance)((irate(node_cpu_seconds_total{instance=~"$instance.*"}[$__rate_interval])))

sum by(instance) (irate(node_cpu_seconds_total{ mode="idle",instance=~"$instance.*"}[$__rate_interval])) / on(instance) group_left sum by (instance)((irate(node_cpu_seconds_total{instance=~"$instance.*"}[$__rate_interval])))
